ldes                                     : SANTA CLAUS goes on television and announces his retirement.  HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s feeling too old, too fat, and the North Pole is too cold for the bones in his pack-strained back.  But the world should not despair because he has the perfect successor.  In fact, he would not even have considered stepping down if he didnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know he could pass on his responsibilities to the popular, the holly, the perfect man for the job, the man he introduces now as Ã¢â‚¬â€œ ROBOTNIKLAUS!  Robotnik, in red suit, red hat, and phony white beard steps onto the screen to overwhelming amounts of electronically-augmented applause.  He emotionally accepts this high honor and announces he will be making a few small changes in the Christmas season.  And his concluding Ho-Ho-HoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sound more than a little ominous.
